description: This babka is a rich and chocolatey treat.
name: Chocolate Babka Loaf Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.6 cup plant based milk, slightly warmed

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 160Â°C. Dissolve the yeast in the warmed milk and 1 tsp of sugar. Stir until fully dissolved and set aside.
Cream the butter together with the rest of the sugar in another mixing bowl. Mix in the yeast and once its all combined fully, allow to sit for 2 hours covered.

Sprinkle some flour on a dry and clean counter top and roll out your dough as much as possible. Now evenly spread the chocolate spread over one side. Then roll the entire dough spread into 1 long roll.

Twist the dough around a few times, then fold in half and plaid the 2 sticks together. Place some baking paper into a suitable baking dish and place the babka. Lightly brush some egg whites over the top.
Bake for 20 minutes, then turn the babka over, brush again with more egg whites and bake for another 20 minutes before serving.
